Articles.Content:
After playing for over 2 years I've finally decided to stop lurking about here and make an account.

The name The_BlackArrrow comes from the Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion, specifically the Arena side campaign where once your charecter is ready to face the reigning champion you have to select a name and this was the one I chose so I used it for this account.

If you don't want to type my whole username just type 'Arrow' and I'll be fine with that.

Here's to many Solid Rocket Boosters Fireworks.

- Arrow
Hi, Arrow. I hope you have a great time here.

Hi, Arrow. I hope you have a great time here.

Hey thanks! Hoping to be here for a long time!

Hello The_BlackArrow, and welcome to the forum

I'm always pleased to usher another lurker in from the cold to our warm, friendly community.

Happy landings!
Thank you for the welcome Starhawk! And I must say from my lurking, what a, mostly, friendly community this is.

Hello The_BlackArrow, and welcome to the forum

I'm always pleased to usher another lurker in from the cold to our warm, friendly community.

Happy landings!

I very much agree!

Welcome to the forums!

I haven't welcomed you yet, and I probably should.

Welcome, The_BlackArrow!

Very cool username, BTW.

I haven't welcomed you yet, and I probably should.

Welcome, The_BlackArrow!

Very cool username, BTW.

Thanks

I feel like Wolves getting domesticatedd is a good metaphor for forum lurkers. First, wolves hid around and took food (Current members whose posts that lurkers read), then humans left out food (People asking for lurkers to join) Then the wolves came out and grabbed the food (Lurkers making an account to add their opion on a thread, only post once or twice) and eventually became dogs (Finally become regular forum members).

I feel like Wolves getting domesticatedd is a good metaphor for forum lurkers. First, wolves hid around and took food (Current members whose posts that lurkers read), then humans left out food (People asking for lurkers to join) Then the wolves came out and grabbed the food (Lurkers making an account to add their opion on a thread, only post once or twice) and eventually became dogs (Finally become regular forum members).

An interesting analogy.
Welcome to the forums The_BlackArrrow, enjoy your stay with the community!
